item.title: 预防宫颈癌的疫苗在英国暴跌
item.description: Vaccinations to prevent cervical cancer have plummeted in Britainvia Vaccinations to prevent cervical cancer have plummeted in Br…HUMAN PAPILLOMAVIRUS (HPV) is an unwelcome consequence of a joyful pursuit.性爱期间的皮肤接触使病毒传播，这可能导致生殖系统的生殖器疣和癌症。在英国，HPV导致大约3500例宫颈…… < /blockquote>

item.title: 巴西狂欢：特朗普外交政策学院
item.description: Brazil bashing: the Trumpian school of foreign policy_EpA handpicked article read aloud from the latest issue of The Economist.唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）对巴西前总统贾尔·博尔森罗（Jair Bolsonaro）进行审判，面对他所谓的反际交往主义。

item.title: 神经在特朗普 - 普丁峰会前的刀边缘
item.description: Nerves are on a knife-edge ahead of the Trump-Putin summit via Nerves are on a knife-edge ahead of the Trump-Putin summit_kqAs Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin prepare to meet in Alaska on August 15th in a历史性的峰会，紧张局势正在不可避免地建立。在乌克兰的前线上，俄罗斯军队在流血的战斗中一直在顿涅茨克（Donetsk）前进，这显然是…… < /blockquote>
